title: vLLM
description: Deploy a vLLM server on SaladCloud nodes with consumer GPUs (default: RTX 4090).

model_id.title: Model
model_id.description: Required* Hugging Face model ID to load and serve with vLLM.

hf_token.title: Hugging Face Token
hf_token.description: Optional. Required only for private or gated Hugging Face models.

max_model_len.title: Max Model Length
max_model_len.description: Optional. Maximum sequence length for the model (in tokens). Adjust based on your model's and compute capabilities.

networking_auth.title: Required* Container Gateway Authentication
networking_auth.description: When enabled, requests must include a SaladCloud API Key to access the container. When disabled, public (unauthenticated) access is allowed.
